sequenceDiagram
  participant User
  participant Marketing
  participant API
  participant DB
  participant Email

  Marketing->>API: lead.create

  API->>Email: send ack + internal alert

  App->>Rules: scan(city, sector)
  App->>Filing: checklist + uploads
  App->>ProofPack: generate + download
